Vehicle.title: Vehicle
Vehicle.description: Represents a vehicle in the transport fleet.

id.description: The unique identifier for the vehicle.

name.description: The name of the vehicle model.

descriptionKey.description: The key for the vehicle's description in the locale files.

imageUrl.description: The URL of the vehicle's image.

imageHint.description: A hint for AI image generation.

featureKeys.description: An array of keys for vehicle features in the locale files.

priceKey.description: The key for the vehicle's price in the locale files.

uid.description: The user's unique ID from Firebase Authentication.

isAdmin.description: Flag to indicate if the user is an administrator.

/vehicles/{vehicleId}.description: Stores all vehicle documents, where the document ID is the vehicle's unique `id` string.

/users/{userId}.description: Stores public user profile data, keyed by user UID.
